thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shijiazhuang Changshan Beiming Technology To Set Up Project Company With Partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shijiazhuang Changshan Beiming Technology To Set Up Project Company With Partners

organizations.name: shijiazhuang changshan beiming technology co ltd

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Shijiazhuang Changshan Beiming Technology Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO SET UP PROJECT COMPANY WITH PARTNERS FOR SMART CITY PROJECT WITH INVESTMENT OF 170 MILLION YUAN ($27.04 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2GKLLK9 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2870 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
